content: get ready for four adorable stocking patterns that everyone is going to love receiving the gift card stocking design consists of four different variations on a single pattern each with unique features that can be mixed and matched to create a wide variety of stockings for decoration ornaments gift-giving and as the name implies adding a handmade touch to giving gift cards these stockings are sure to be both loved and shared for generations happy crocheting pattern information + your pdf purchase includes written instructions and helpful photographs to aid in construction + the patterns are written in english using us crochet terminology + the patterns are formatted to have one featured image at the beginning of each of the patterns for reference important images for construction within the pattern and all other full-sized images at the end for easy optional printing skills needed + the skill level needed is beginner to advanced beginner + the techniques you will need to know include chain single_crochet slip_stitch increase working in the back loop only working in the back bar of the chain and the adjustable magic ring working with fur yarn which takes some practice is also utilized but optional materials needed + to complete the gift card stockings you will need yarn in your choice of colors about 40-50 yds/36 5-46 m of worsted/aran and about 10-12 yds/9-11 m of furry yarn depending on stocking choice a size g/6 4 0 mm crochet hook stitch markers tapestry needle scissors and optionally a ¾ inch 20 mm pom-pom maker buttons and trim finished measurements + the gift card stockings measure approximately 3 5 inches 9 cm across at the widest point by 5 25 inches 13 cm tall not including the hanging tab thank you thank you for supporting my small business it means the world wishing you a blessed day as you spread kindness and creativity happy crocheting find more this pattern along with many other designs can be found here on ravelry and the blog at www jenhayescreations com copyright this pattern and its photos are copyright of jennifer hayes jen hayes creations and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not copy sell republish distribute or translate this pattern and its images in part or whole you are welcome to sell any finished items produced from this pattern please credit jen hayes creations as the designer and include a link to the pattern listing if selling the finished piece online thank you share your work follow along on instagram at @jenhayescreations tag @jenhayescreations and use the hashtags #jenhayescreations and #gift card stockings to show off your creations and of course link your projects to the design here on ravelry i m so excited to see what you ll create follow me blog www
